title: Comedy.Trip.Movie.Pack-mD
description:
Boat Trip (2002)

Overview
Director: Mort Nathan
Writers (WGA): Mort Nathan (written by) & William Bigelow (written by)
Release Date: 20 February 2003 (Germany)
Genre: Comedy
Tagline: Singles Cruise. Double Trouble. 

Plot Outline: Jerry and Nick are two best buddies whose love lives have hit rock bottom, Jerry&#039;s especially, having just
vomited all over his fiancT on a hot air balloon trip prior to proposing to her. To escape their troubles and find women, 
they book a trip on board a cruise-liner, unaware the travel agent has just played a horrid trick on them in retaliation 
for Nick offending his secret gay lover. And that&#039;s the trick; it&#039;s a gay cruise-liner for gay men to meet and mingle. 
Slowly but surely, the two main characters begin to realize this and in turn get into a lot of humorous predicaments.

iMDB : http://imdb.com/title/tt0285462/
Cinemagia : http://www.cinemagia.ro/movie.php?movie_id=512


---

EuroTrip (2004)

Overview
Director: Jeff Schaffer
Writers (WGA): Alec Berg (written by) & David Mandel (written by)
Release Date: 17 June 2004 (Germany) 
Genre: Comedy / Adventure more
Tagline: No actual Europeans were harmed in the making of this film. 

Plot Outline : When Scotty&#039;s German online pen pal suggests they meet, he initially freaks out. But then he discovers
that she&#039;s gorgeous, and heads out with three friends after graduation to meet her. As they travel across Europe, the
four friends have comical misadventures.

iMDB : http://imdb.com/title/tt0356150/
Cinemagia : http://www.cinemagia.ro/movie.php?movie_id=8474


---

Road Trip (2000)

Overview
Director: Todd Phillips
Writers (WGA): Todd Phillips (written by) & Scot Armstrong (written by)
Release Date: 24 August 2000 (Germany)
Genre: Adventure / Comedy more
Tagline: The greatest college tradition of all time. 

Plot Outline : Josh and Tiffany have been together since they were kids. ENTER Beth, a sexy blonde going to college
with Josh. One night, Josh and Beth hook up and make a videotape the same day that Josh plans to mail a video to Tiffany
of him talking about college life. The wrong tape gets sent, forcing Josh, along with a few pals, to go to Austin, where Tiffany
is, and stop her from seeing the tape. Full of laughs, you&#039;ll be sure to enjoy Road Trip.

iMDB : http://imdb.com/title/tt0215129/
Cinemagia : http://www.cinemagia.ro/movie.php?movie_id=107

Enjoy!
